title: mayangAdE manamE
sahitya:
mayangAdE manamE tOTrattil


anupallavi

  tayangit-tayangip-pala sAhasam kATTiyE tAvi unnaip-piDikkum cancala mAyattil


caraNam    pADiyum Adiyum Udiyum kUDiyum bandhanai sheidu sugandhanaip-paritta pin
mODi sheidODiDum mUrkha vilangai nambi mutti koDukkum shiva bhaktiyai marandu nI
